##### Time - Biomass {.tabset .tabset-dropdown}

###### Means

```{r}
p_isolated_biomass = plot.patches.points(ds_patches, 
                                         patch_type_input,
                                         response_variable) %>%
  print()
```

The last time points it seems like small patches are crashing. Let's what's happening to them.

Time point 6:

```{r}
ds_patches %>%
  filter(disturbance == disturbance_global_input,
         time_point == 6,
         patch_type == "Small isolated") %>%
  select(all_of(response_variable)) %>%
  mutate(across(everything(), round, digits = 2))
```

Time point 7:

```{r}
ds_patches %>%
  filter(disturbance == disturbance_global_input,
         time_point == 7,
         patch_type == "Small isolated") %>%
  select(all_of(response_variable)) %>%
  mutate(across(everything(), round, digits = 2))
```
